Action.author: yacovm
Action.body: what about CI support? Is it ready?

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Ok, per discussion starting here https://chat.hyperledger.org/channel/fabric-release?msg=TFMNYRZmECKeghMgz Â deferring the branch calving to another day. Just tag and publish release from tag.

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: In a line, we did not want to defer the release (tag), while we are working out the branching model for 1.0 and the next ones.
